author: andy_seaborne
msg: Changes due to move to using Assemblers for creating and freeing
system resources.  The policy is determined by the AttachedModel.

author: andy_seaborne
msg: An AttachedModel whose model is permanent, i.e. the system resources
are not freed at any point during the running of a server.

author: andy_seaborne
msg: Assemblers for files and database backed RDF.
Assemblers handle the creation and release of the RDF models.

author: andy_seaborne
msg: Get rid of old AttachedModel code.
Now, AttchedModels are policies for OS resources (fixed, caching)
and the creation and release of the RDf resources is handled by Assemblers.
